Patent Information.Patent Title: Antimicrobial peptide, its analogs and antimicrobial composition comprising them.
Patent Information.Abstract: Disclosed is a novel antimicrobial peptide having excellent antimicrobial activities, its analogs and an antimicrobial composition comprising them. The antimicrobial peptide alternatively comprises basic amino acid residues and hydrophobic amino acid residues, and is able to penetrate into microbial cells and act against a wide variety of microorganisms.
